com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface SegmentHitTest

All Known Subinterfaces:
Polygon, Polyline
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePolygon, BasePolyline, Envelope
public interface SegmentHitTest

Defines a method to allow selection of a segment within a Polygon or Polyline.

Method Summary
 boolean segmentHitTest(Point queryPoint, double searchRadius, SegmentHitResult result)
          Allows you to select a segment within a polygon or polyline.
 

Method Detail

segmentHitTest

public boolean segmentHitTest(Point queryPoint,
                              double searchRadius,
                              SegmentHitResult result)
Allows you to select a segment within a polygon or polyline. If a hit is found, then the contents of the SegmentHitResult will be updated, else will be undefined.

Parameters:
queryPoint - the center of the search radius
searchRadius - the maximum distance to consider
result - the segment which is closest to the query point
Returns:
True if a hit is found, else False
